name: The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns
storyline: Jump into an all-new adventure with 3 unique game episodes and over 12 exciting levels. Lead Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private as you commence super-secret missions in, under and outside of the zoo, culminating in the grand finale in Dr. Blowhole’s Lair. Exclusive to the Wii uDraw GameTablet: Use the uDraw GameTablet fto search hidden areas for useful bonuses, erase obstacles to uncover special items, and unlock more than 70 printable coloring pages that feature everyone’s favorite characters from The Penguins of Madagascar.
summary: Solve perilous puzzles, build crazy contraptions, nimbly navigate hazards, play through a multitude of mini-games and rescue Marlene, Mort, and the rest of the zoo crew in your mission to save the world.
